participants.name: Alicia Isaacson
participants.title: IT Technical Recruiter at MDI Group

messages.message:
Hello

Hi Brian, 

I'm currently seeking a Java Developer for my client in Phoenix. Must be a US Citizen or Green Card holder. No C2C. This is a direct hire position. 

They are looking for someone with the following:

Minimum 3 years of hands-one Software Development experience
2+ years of experience in Java development
Demonstrable, proven expertise in Object-Oriented Analysis, Design, and Implementation, and with applied experience using Design Patterns
Intermediate knowledge of Relational Databases, SQL and ORM technologies
Experience in the Spring Framework
Experience in developing web applications using at least one popular web framework (Struts, Spring MVC)
Experience with test-driven development
Experience with Apache/Tomcat/MySQL
Experience in Agile/Scrum software development methodologies
Experience with the following open-source project, Ant, JUnit, Log4J, Jakarta Commons

If your interested, please send me an email.

Thanks for your time and enjoy the rest of your day.

Alicia Isaacson
aisaacson@mdigroup.com
